text:
[Verse]
Gray clouds above us
Colors they will clash
Puddles in the street
Let's make a splash

[Verse 2]
Shoes soaked and laughing
Spinning on a dime
In the pouring drops
We lose track of time

[Chorus]
Rain rain fall again
We’re dancing in the rain
No umbrellas needed
We embrace the pain

[Verse 3]
Lightning strikes the sky
Rumbles all around
Close your eyes and feel
Heartbeat matching sound

[Chorus]
Rain rain fall again
We’re dancing in the rain
No umbrellas needed
We embrace the pain

[Bridge]
Life can be so clear
When you just let go
Find the joy in wet
And the river’s flow
title: Dancing in the Rain
